Events >> Ride On You Crazy Diamond

Many Saturday mornings, we have a casual road ride or a family ride at 8 am. weather pending. Please contact us at bikeseastside@gmail.com or call the shop at 615-469-1079

For the more rigorously minded, we often leave Sundays at 8am from the shop. 30+ miles @ 16+ mph. Must have group ride experience. If you have a route that you'd like to share, call the shop and become a ride leader.

MTB Rides Interested in dirt?—We have more dirt experience than any shop in town!! Let us know where you are riding! For trail info give us a call or check out our Guide section below. Be sure join Eastside Rides on meetup.



Long recognized as one of the Southeast’s premier bicycling events, the Harpeth River Ride offers an epic cycling experience for bicyclists of all skill levels. This year , on Saturday June 21st, riders can choose from four great routes – 100, 62, 45, & 23 miles
